You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesC C] > &cscr;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Cscr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D49E.
  * `&cscr;` maps to the Unicode character U+1D4B8.
